docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges idled through a quiet trading week. With transfers limited in volume price changes were minor in size. Absence of demand reflected the usual mid-month lack of interest.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges idled through a quiet trading week. With transfers limited in volume price changes were minor in size. Absence of demand reflected the usual mid-month lack of interest.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended June 11, 1954

docs.snippet: LONDON, June 14 (UP) -- Art Larsen, Louise Brough and seven other United States players won singles matches today as the London grass court tennis championships began at the Queen's Club. Four other Americans were eliminated.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 14 (UP) -- Art Larsen, Louise Brough and seven other United States players won singles matches today as the London grass court tennis championships began at the Queen's Club. Four other Americans were eliminated.

headline.main: LARSEN ADVANCES ON LONDON COURT; Louise Brough, 7 Other U. S. Players Also Move Ahead as Tennis Play Starts

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., June 14 -- The United Nations will take one more step Wednesday toward action to try to prevent the spread of the Indochinese war.

headline.main: THAI APPEAL GOES TO U. N. TOMORROW; Security Council Will Begin Weighing Bid for a Team to Police Indochina War

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 14 -- The United States has cold-shouldered a Guatemalan proposal for a conference to study "all causes of tension" between the two countries.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 14 -- The United States has cold-shouldered a Guatemalan proposal for a conference to study "all causes of tension" between the two countries.

docs.snippet: WAUKEGAN, Ill., June 14 (AP) -- Patty Berg, with birdies on the last three holes bettered par by five strokes today with a 36, 34 -- 70 to smash the course record and win the medal in the women's Western open golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: WAUKEGAN, Ill., June 14 (AP) -- Patty Berg, with birdies on the last three holes bettered par by five strokes today with a 36, 34 -- 70 to smash the course record and win the medal in the women's Western open golf tournament.

headline.main: Miss Berg Registers Record 70 In Gaining Western Open Medal

docs.snippet: WAUKEGAN, Ill., June 15 (AP) -- Patty Berg, the medalist, and Louise Suggs, the defending champion, easily moved through the first round of the women's Western open today but such stars as Joyce Ziske, Marlene Bauer and Betty Mackinnon were upset.
docs.lead_paragraph: WAUKEGAN, Ill., June 15 (AP) -- Patty Berg, the medalist, and Louise Suggs, the defending champion, easily moved through the first round of the women's Western open today but such stars as Joyce Ziske, Marlene Bauer and Betty Mackinnon were upset.

headline.main: Misses Berg and Suggs Gain in Western Open; MISS MARTIN BEATS MISS ZISKE ON 19TH Miss Berg Victor Over Miss Armstrong in First Round of Western Open Golf

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, June 16 (UP) -- Four former champions today gained the quarter-finals in the twenty-fifth annual women's Western open golf tournament at the Glen Flora Country Club.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 18 -- The State Department said this evening it had information of "serious uprisings" in Guatemala but had received no word about a bombing announced by the Guatemalan Foreign Minister.
